title: 15 days suspension? For what?
body:
By yesterday i was playing as lee sin on jungle trying to help every lane on my team but that wasnt enough  of them cuz they was losing still and flame me especially lux at mid.. Until i was telling their mistake.. Like our yasuo at top... i was in enemys jungle trying to take the red from the top right side of the map ezreal came and we had a fight i died unfortunately and yasuo after my death flashed to him and chased under their second tower on top and died without doing anything he was just flashed and walked under tower... And i mentioned that to him!!!
Do i deserve this day suspension? They was the one who flamed me like all the time while i was trying my best and god that was in my series to plat... After i was joining my next game in the champion select just right when we finish the picks and was about to load the game it disconnected me and popped my day suspension... With this i lost my series
If you can somehow Rito go watch my match replay... Watch carefully my moves... Somehow... But dont give pls that suspension...

replies.body: After looking over those chat logs, it looks like there were some pretty heated words coming from your end. I don't want to give out your personal chat logs, but keep in mind Riot has a certain zero tolerance policy for certain words and phrases. If you want the full context of what was said and why this punishment was placed, feel free to hit up our player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Ok...?? So the others can* use the so heated words for me but i dont? They should be the one with the day suspension....
I am playing this game from season 1 or  2 from when it was came out maybe... I have put all my life in this game unlocked and done all things and you will just ripped it off of me?
Ok tnx you could use the chat ban instead if there was the so heated words from me not the day suspension for someone who play this game for so long over those newbies who flames cuz cant play and reports us and unfortunately their* reports for some reason works... But my report on that lux didnt...
